text: Manuel Delgado Parker (November 18, 1936 – 16 September 2019) was a Peruvian businessman. He was born in Lima. He founded the media company Grupo RPP.Manuel Delgado Parker, RPP Group In 1990 Manuel founded the Society of Latin America Broadcasting, made up of the main radio networks of Ecuador, Colombia, Venezuela Bolivia and Argentina. He was responsible for leading Panamericana Televisión during the 1990s. Delgado Parker died on 16 September 2019 in Lima at the age of 82.Fallece Manuel Delgado Parker ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Peruvian businesspeople Category:People from Lima
title: Manuel Delgado Parker
